title: Any Mac users here?
content: Im just curious. Are there any mac users in here? Or are the majority of the people windows and *nix users?

title: Re: Any Mac users here?
content:
I guess not many are. Is it any good? I'm using Windows XP. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Any Mac users here?
content: I recently switched to a Mac, and I'd have to say that the overall experience is more positive from my point of view than either Windows or Linux. Note the choice of the words "more positive" - OS X is by no means perfect, and I experience as many crashes as I did on Windows (in the case of Firefox, many more). However, it nicely combines point-and-click simplicity with Unix power, and as a result it's definitely my favourite OS.

content:
